contains

   subroutine add_edge(list, node)

      type(edge_list), intent(inout) :: list

      integer, intent(in) :: node

      integer :: new_size, old_size

      old_size = size(list%edges)

      new_size = old_size +1

      if (allocated(list%edges)) then

         call move_alloc(list%edges, temp)

         deallocate(list%edges)

      else

         temp = [integer ::]

      end if

      allocate(list%edges(new_size)) list%edges(1:old_size) = temp

      list%edges(new_size) = node

   end subroutine

   recursive subroutine dfs(node, parent, is_cycle)

      integer, intent(in) :: node, parent

      logical, intent(out) :: is_cycle

      integer :: neighbor

      integer :: i

      logical :: found_cycle

      is_cycle = .false. if (seen(node)) then

         is_cycle = .true.

         return

      end if

      seen(node) = .true. do i=1, size(adj(node)%edges)

         neighbor = adj(node)%edges(i) if (neighbor /= parent) then

            count = count +1

            call dfs(neighbor, node, found_cycle)

            if (found_cycle) then

               is_cycle = .true.

               return

            end if

         end if

      end do

   end subroutine

   function process_forward(s) result(count)

      character(len=*), intent(in) :: s

      integer :: count =0

      character(len=len(s)) :: temp = s

      integer :: i

      do i=2, len(temp)

         if (temp(i) == temp(i-1)) then

            if (temp(i) == '1') then

               temp(i) = '0'

            else

               temp(i) = '1'

            end if

            count = count +1

         end if

      end do

   end function

   function process_backward(s) result(count)

      character(len=*), intent(in) :: s

      integer :: count =0

      character(len=len(s)) :: temp = s

      integer :: i

      do i = len(temp), 2, -1

         if (temp(i) == temp(i-1)) then

            if (temp(i-1) == '1') then

               temp(i-1) = '0'

            else

               temp(i-1) = '1'

            end if

            count = count +1

         end if

      end do

   end function

end program

Function process_forward(s) result(count)

   character(len=*), intent(in) :: s

   integer :: count =0

   character(len=len(s)) :: temp = s

   do i=2, len(s)

      if (temp(i) == temp(i-1)) then

         if (temp(i) == '1') then

            temp(i) = '0'

         else

            temp(i) = '1'

         end if

         count = count +1

      end if

   end do
